title: Why won't ADCs buy last whisper against tank comps?
body: Seems pretty simple to me.  If the enemy team has a huge front line and the only people you can safely attack are the tanks why not buy an anti-tank item?

replies.body: They save it for later as it doesn't provide enough damage on its own (they want more damage first so they can fight other people).

Last whisper isn't really that good anymore since the change and is hard to fit into builds against most SoloQ team comps.

I would definitely build it close to last against three tanks.

It use to shred tanks, now it's just another item.

Would you rather do slightly more damage to tanks before you die or survive the massive amount of engage?

Fact is: A dead adc can't do damage.

i made a post about last whisper a few hours ago, you cant rush it cause its a waste, and it only works vs tanks while havin a weak build path and tanks start to get very tanks after the 25th min, better to just get another crit item into a BT which works vs everything...

cleaver also works vs everything and helps ur team, gives you CDR sticking power and HP, why bother with LW?

Not rush, get it like 3rd or 4th item.  Seriously, I've had games where the ADC is sitting on full build against a team with 3 tanks and he doesn't have a last whisper item.  Then he whines about tanks being op.
